1.0.0.en: Collect weather data from existing sensors and send them as APRS/CWOP weather report to APRS-IS network.

1.0.1.en: Collect weather data from existing sensors and send them to APRS/CWOP network.

1.0.2.en: FIX: Path issue to helper libraries

1.0.3.en: FIX: Catch promise rejects from setStoreValue

1.0.4.en: Switch APRS tocall to registered APHMEY deviceid.

1.0.5.en: Add error handling by catching Promise calls.

1.0.8.en: FIX: APRS packet lat/lon for 0-prefixed decimal minutes.

1.0.9.en: ADD: Option to select Nordic APRS pool

1.0.10.en: FIX. Rain reset at midnight, rain TX-conversion.
